test-case.name: fn-available-environment-variables-005
test-case.description: Check that we get back () or a sequence that accepts a predicate
test-case.test: let $all := fn:available-environment-variables() return empty($all) or ($all[1] ne "")

test-case.name: fn-available-environment-variables-006
test-case.description: Check that no returned values are non-strings
test-case.test: (for $e in fn:available-environment-variables() return fn:environment-variable($e) instance of xs:string) = (false())

test-case.name: fn-available-environment-variables-007
test-case.description: Check that we can call environment-variable on each returned result

test-case.name: fn-available-environment-variables-008
test-case.description: check there are no duplicates in the variable names
test-case.test: let $all := fn:available-environment-variables() return count($all) eq count(distinct-values($all))
